Presented at DAFNI Wales Roadshow 2024

September 2024 XR, WebXR, glyphs, situated, analytics, toolkits, authoring

Panos presented a lightning talk on our Immersive and Situated Analytics systems at the DAFNI Wales Roadshow 2024 event, held at the Computational Foundry, Swansea University. We discussed research into infrastructure systems, synergies with visualization, and the challenges and opportunities of data sharing.
